title: Topic 001 Question 441
body: A company wants its Amazon EC2 instances to be in different locations but share the same geographic area. The company also wants to use multiple power grids and independent networking connectivity for the EC2 instances.
options: Use EC2 instances in multiple edge locations in the same AWS Region.
Use EC2 instances in multiple Availability Zones in the same AWS Region.
Use EC2 instances in multiple Amazon Connect locations in the same AWS Region.
Use EC2 instances in multiple AWS Artifact locations in the same AWS Region.
